entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
